last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 13
last_episode_to_air.overview: The killers hold Da hostage and demand that Jess bring them her phone. Meanwhile, a man from Jess's past reappears.

name: Bangkok Love Stories: Objects of Affection
original_name: Bangkok รัก Stories: สิ่งของ
overview: A kind computer repairman falls for a street-smart graffiti artist whose multiple personality disorder gets worse after she witnesses a double murder.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: While graffitiing at night, Jess witnesses a violent double murder and records it on her phone, but the killers see her before she can get away.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Qten does his best to fix Jess's phone, but it's severely damaged. Then, a flamboyant woman who looks spookily like Jess comes asking for her phone.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: This time, a bar girl named Pinky shows up at the shop asking for her phone, and she's even more persistent than Joey.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Jess recalls the childhood trauma caused by her father's sudden death. Next, an innocent-looking girl named Jenny comes asking for Jess's phone.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Qten goes to the bar where Jess works, unsure of which girl will show up this time. He sees Jess and confronts her, demanding answers, but gets none.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: As hard as Qten tries to talk to Jess, all he gets are Pinky, Jenny and even Joey. Da arrives and starts to explain Jess's condition to him.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Qten attempts to find out more about Jess's worsening condition. When Pinky shows up, Qten tries to ask her about Jess, but she just wants to party.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: When Jess was a child, her mother enrolled her in after-school dance classes, where she was abused by the teacher. The trauma affects her to this day.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: The killers break into Jess's apartment, determined to finally get her this time. Qten tries to fix the toy Jess's father gave her as a child.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: At first, Jess isn't happy that Qten has shown up at her mother's house outside the city, but her mother seems to like having him around.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: While spending their time peacefully in the countryside, Qten and Jess talk about her different personalities and where they came from.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Qten and Jess return to the city and learn that the killers have beaten up and threatened their friends. Worried, Qten takes Jess to a psychiatrist.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: The killers hold Da hostage and demand that Jess bring them her phone. Meanwhile, a man from Jess's past reappears.
